name: Stronger together (Kekmasterion)
description:
Both players have to press the same controls for things to happen, your goal is to reach the end of the levels which are the doors (You both have to stand on them to be able to go to the next level).  Levers can also open locked walls.

PLAYER 1: S, A, D - Running; W - Jumping

PLAYER 2: Arrow keys - Running and Jumping
